about_the_game:
Play a selection of Arcade Games, including 2 that are unreleased in the base game!
All of them offer unique twists, altering the gameplay of it and/or shifting its genre in creative ways!

You can chose between Demo Mode and Arcade Mode.

In Demo Mode, you need to help the Ghost of the arcade get enough tickets to acquire a Cleaning Device (definitely not a watergun) to make the old Arcade Hall shine again!

In the overhauled Arcade Mode, you can chose freely between all available games and play them at your will!
